Description of incident: The Big Blue Bus has notified customers of a data breach when the  company discovered unauthorized access at NextBus, a third party company  that Big Blue Bus works with to provide real-time bus arrival  information to customers. The individual (s) may have gained  accress to account information of customers. The company claims that no  Social Security numbers or financial information was compromised.  The  company is recommending that customers change their passwords and to  watch for potential phishing scams. For those with questions call 1-877-639-8287.More Information: http://smdp.com/data-breach-involves-big-blue-bus-customers/151000
